title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not being displayed in the Available Items sector.
OB: In the Available Items sector, after expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon, the column icons are missing.
EB: When expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon in the Available Items sector, the expected result is that the table icons and column icons will be displayed. However, currently, the column icons are not showing up.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the Available Items sector. 3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon. 4. Observe that the column icons are missing.
